rooms.title: Town Square
rooms.content: This is the grand town square of Midgaard.  The famous Fountain of Hyrengaard stands here, flowing clear water.  Citizens mill about happily around the open courtyard.

rooms.title: North of Town Square
rooms.content: Richly adorned houses line the pebbled street that stretches to the north and south.

rooms.title: East of Town Square
rooms.content: Beautiful shops line the pebbled street that leads to the east and west.

rooms.title: South of Town Square
rooms.content: The pebbled street leads north and south from here.

rooms.title: West of Town Square
rooms.content: Beautiful shops line the pebbled street that stretches to the east and west.
